validationRule.errorMessage: Street Name cannot be more than 60 characters.
Post Code cannot be more than 10 characters.
Please enter Max Power with 2 decimal places

fields.name: legendsDetails
fields.fieldText:
Case Legends:

SPD: SP Distribution , SPM: SP Manweb, DO: Domestic ,CO: Commercial, MX: Mixed

fields.name: heatingLegendsExt
fields.fieldText:
Heating Type Legends:

1: Electric Heating, 2: No Heating, 3: Non-Electric Heating

fields.name: heatingGuide
fields.fieldText:
Please follow below instructions while choosing heating method and corresponding heating type description:

For Example:

If Company Id is SPD, Customer Class is DO (Domestic) and heating method selected as Electric Heating (1), then please choose one of the following values which contains suffix as SPD-DO-1:

  • Dom Two rate WHITE METER 1,Credit NHH-SPD-DO/MX-1
  • Dom Unrestricted single rate credit NHH-SPD-DO/MX-1

If Company Id is SPM, Customer Class is MX (Mixed) or CO (Commercial) and heating method selected as No Heating (2), then please choose one of the following values which contains suffix as SPM-CO/MX-2:

  • EHV-SiteSpecific-Form Req-SPD/SPM-DO/CO/MX-2
  • HH CT Metered HV Net Import-SPM-CO/MX-2

validationRule.errorMessage: Prefix cannot be more than 4 characters in length.
